text: S pokayaniyem obrashchayushchimsya k Bogu, sluzhashchim Yemu, slavyashchem Yego, khodyashchim na pokloneniye Yemu, klanyayushchimsya, kolenopreklonyayushchimsya, nauchayushchim dobromu, uderzhivayushchim ot zakonoprestupnogo, soblyudayushchim ustavy Boga, - vsem sim veruyushchim vozvesti radost'
